pullRequest.title: Add JVM only extensions for minio
pullRequest.bodyText: This is an auto-generated pull request to add JVM only support for minio.You can edit the changes by checking out branch add-jvm-extensions-bb4d4dc7.

nodes.bodyText: @ppalaga Any ideas why it set jvmSince to the previous release?
